feature_title: Create and Submit Export Shipments (EEI Filing)

user_stories.action: create a new export shipment declaration by entering essential header information like parties involved, transport details, and relevant dates
user_stories.benefit: initiate the EEI filing process accurately and ensure basic shipment context is captured for compliance
related_functionality: Input shipment header information (parties, transport details, dates).

user_stories.action: add detailed commodity line item information including description, tariff number, quantity, value, unit of measure, ECCN, Export Information Code (EIC), and country of origin to my shipment declaration
user_stories.benefit: ensure all mandatory commodity data is provided as required by US export regulations
related_functionality: Input commodity line item details (description, tariff number, quantities, values, units of measure, ECCN, EIC, origin).

user_stories.action: create declarations for shipments containing multiple distinct commodity lines within a single filing
user_stories.benefit: efficiently handle complex shipments with various goods without needing separate filings for each commodity type
related_functionality: Support shipments with single or multiple commodity lines.
Input commodity line item details (description, tariff number, quantities, values, units of measure, ECCN, EIC, origin).

user_stories.action: specify two different units of measure and their corresponding quantities for commodity lines that require dual reporting
user_stories.benefit: comply accurately with reporting requirements for specific tariff numbers mandating dual units of measure
related_functionality: Handle commodities requiring two units of measure.
Input commodity line item details (description, tariff number, quantities, values, units of measure, ECCN, EIC, origin).

user_stories.action: transmit the completed export shipment declaration data electronically to the CBP AES system in the required format
user_stories.benefit: fulfill the legal requirement for EEI submission and obtain necessary export clearance for my client's shipment
related_functionality: Transmit shipment data to AES in the specified format (e.g., ABI).

user_stories.action: receive a unique Shipment Reference Number (SRN) upon successfully creating or attempting to submit an EEI filing
user_stories.benefit: easily track, reference, and manage specific export filings within the system and with CBP
related_functionality: Generate unique Shipment Reference Numbers.

user_stories.action: create and submit a complete EEI filing, including header and all commodity details, on behalf of an Exporter (USPPI)
user_stories.benefit: provide essential forwarding services and ensure export compliance for the clients I represent
related_functionality: Input shipment header information (parties, transport details, dates).
Input commodity line item details (description, tariff number, quantities, values, units of measure, ECCN, EIC, origin).
Support shipments with single or multiple commodity lines.
Handle commodities requiring two units of measure.
Transmit shipment data to AES in the specified format (e.g., ABI).
Generate unique Shipment Reference Numbers.

user_stories.action: create and submit a complete EEI filing when acting as the authorized agent for an export shipment
user_stories.benefit: fulfill regulatory obligations for export reporting when acting in an agency capacity for the USPPI or forwarder
